resources.string: Rock Paper Scissors Board Game with equal amount of figures per type
Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock Board Game with equal amount of figures per type
Rock Paper Scissors Board Game with manually chosen amount of figures per type
Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock Board Game with manually chosen amount of figures per type
Privacy Friendly Rock Paper Scissors Board Game does not use any permissions
Welcome to the help page. This app is a board game variant of the famous hand game Rock-Paper-Scissors. It features a single device multiplayer with different game modes.
The app features several gamemodes that can be accessed by either swiping in the main menu or tapping the arrow buttons
This game mode features the default game with 5 Rocks, 5 Papers, 5 Scissors and one Flag for each player.
This game mode features the default game with the option for each player to choose on their own how many figures of each category they want to have.
This game mode features the extended game with lizard and spock figures with 3 rocks, 3 papers, 3 scissors, 3 lizards, 3 spocks and one Flag for each player.
This game mode features the extended game with lizard and spock figures with the option for each player to choose on their own how many figures of each category they want to have.
You can move figures by tapping it and than swiping it to the field you want it to go to.
You can also move by tapping a figure once and then tapping the destination. By tapping the figure you will also get a highlighting for possible destinations.
To start a fight move your figure onto a field occupied by an opponents figure. The figures will then fight based on the principles of Rock Paper Scissor or Rock Paper Scissor Lizard Spock
When a draw occurs you as well as your opponent will be asked to select a new type for your figure. Both of the new figures will then reenter the fight. The types remain after the fight.
The game is won when you discover the opponents flag.
Use timer to dismiss the dialog shown in a fight or dismiss manually
Choose after how many seconds the dialog should be dismissed
Privacy Friendly Rock Paper Scissors Board Game

Welcome to Privacy Friendly Rock Paper Scissors Boardgame.
Rock Paper Scissors Boardgame is a combination of Rock Paper Scissors and Chess. Rocks, papers and scissors are the figures of the game and can \"fight\" against each other.
The game\'s aim is capturing your opponents flag which is hidden between the opponent\'s figure. The opponent can either be another person or a computer.

Our apps will have to say goodbye to Google Play. You can continue to use the app but you will not receive any updates in the future. You can find more info about the reasons and why this isn_t the end of the Privacy Friendly Apps on our website:
